products.title: Skye Aruba Blue (Blackout)
products.description: The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window. Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit velux, rooflite, keylite, fakro and dakstra roof windows. Offering optimum light control each blind can be positioned effortlessly to sit at any desired point within the side channels. All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.

products.title: Phoebe, Aqua - Roman Blind
products.description: Blues are the stars of the show in the phoebe aqua, but they're not on their own. Cobalt, sky, and aqua blues are mixed with fun shades of apple green, lemon yellow, and coral orange, resulting in a fun and eclectic look sure to liven up any living space. Add the aqua to a room in need of some inspiration, such as a plain utility room or hallway, or a creative space such as an art studio or playroom.

products.title: Dill Teal Roman Blind
products.description: What says summer better than beautiful flowering botanicals. Dill is the plant of choice in this stunning clarissa hulse design. The silhouettes are burnt out onto a gorgeous teal blue ombre. The modern, vibrant flavour of this roman blind is certain to add a pop of colour to you what says summer better than beautiful flowering botanicals.

products.title: Blowing Grasses Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Each clarissa hulse design comes with a personal story and this one is inspired by blustery walks in the greek and british countrysides. The result is an elegant, feathery print of swaying grasses that will add beauty and charm to your home. This blind is picked out in contrastin each clarissa hulse design comes with a personal story and this one is inspired by blustery walks in the greek and british countrysides.

products.title: Bali Azure Roman Blind
products.description: Just like a warm summer's day, this bali azure roman blind is energetic, buzzing with colour and stylish flare. We simply adore the way that the bold fiery orange offsets the tonal blues, bringing warmth the a cool palette. Well done harlequin.

products.title: Gardenia Inky Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Bursting with calming tones, the gardenia inky blue roman blind features a lovely array of blue shades, with a touch of green to create a well-rounded display. One of harlequins most loved designs, weve given this gardenia pattern a freshening up for their harlequin additions bursting with calming tones, the gardenia inky blue roman blind features a lovely array of blue shades, with a touch of green to create a well-rounded display.

products.title: Dragonfly Mineral Blue Curtain
products.description: Their dragonfly range, inspired by the same winged water insect, combined modern design with contemporary trend shades to create this a highly sought-after fabric. This mineral blue dragonfly curtain, in a soft blue colour, makes this muted curtain a must for insect-lovers. Produced from a cotton/linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to adorn, you can be confident that this dragonfly mineral blue curtain is suitable.

products.title: Dragonfly Aqua Curtain
products.description: Their dragonfly range, inspired by the same winged water insect, combined modern design with contemporary trend shades to create this a highly sought-after fabric. This aqua blue dragonfly curtain blind, on a soft white background, makes this muted curtain a must for nature lovers. Produced from a cotton/linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to adorn, you can be confident that this dragonfly aqua curtain is suitable.

products.title: Bumblebee Teal Curtain
products.description: Their bumblebee range mixes patterns inspired by a traditional favourite of english gardeners, and contemporary shades. Classic traditional design, on a bold jewel-tone teal blue background makes this bumblebee curtain a must for nature-lovers and keen gardeners alike. Produced from a cotton/linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to enliven, you can be confident that this bumblebee teal curtain is suitable.

products.title: Bumblebee Mineral Blue Curtain
products.description: Their bumblebee range mixes patterns inspired by a traditional favourite of english gardeners, and contemporary shades. Classic traditional design, on a soft sky blue background makes this bumblebee curtain a must for nature-lovers and keen gardeners alike. Produced from a cotton/linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to enliven, you can be confident that this bumblebee mineral blue curtain is suitable.

products.title: Paradise, Saxon Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: The naturally toned paradise in saxon blue offers gorgeous shades of green and blue on a soft white background. And, made from 100% cotton, its smooth fabric sits neatly in attractive roman folds, looking right at home wherever it's hung. Use the saxon blue to breathe colour into the living room, surrounding it with matching cool blues, as well as the occasional green to accent. Add plenty of fresh cotton and linen fabrics in the form of throws and cushions for extra cosiness.

products.title: Hollihocks, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: The gorgeous shades of navy, teal, and pink in the stunningly country-style hollihocks navy stand out beautifully against the pale background and olive green accents. With it's linen-feel woven fabric, this roman blind is the perfect addition to a more rural setting. Pair the navy with country cream or palest blue walls in the kitchen or dining room for a fresh garden style. Use the vibrant colours of the fabric to choose accenting accessories in various shades, from placemats to utensils.

products.title: Aretha, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: The aretha in navy offers colour galore, blending beautiful shades of rich indigo, deep teal, bright coral, and warm fuchsia with muted tones of green, grey, and beige. The end result is bold and striking, with unforgettable colour. Use the navy as the star of the show in your living room or dining room. Surround with equally rich colours, tempering with soft creams and neutrals as needed. You'll end up with a warm and cosy room full of rich colour and character.

products.title: Evenfall Dusky Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Look at all that gorgeous texture on this evenfall dusky blue roman blind. The base fabric is awash with beautifully woven threads in rich, navy blue. Surrounded on three sides by a charcoal border, it's the height of sophistication. The skinny border frames things nicely to give look at all that gorgeous texture on this evenfall dusky blue roman blind.

products.title: Splash Turquoise Blue Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash turquoise blue perfect fit roller blind is perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this saturated blue perfect fit blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time. products.title: Dill Teal Roller Blind
products.description: We just love the intensity of these blue-green tones. Graduated from light to richly dark at the bottom they will add plenty of vibrancy to your home. But what about that glorious clarissa hulse pattern? The burnt out silhouettes of the dill plant sprout up playfully from the bot we just love the intensity of these blue-green tones.

products.title: Meadow Teal Roller Blind
products.description: Ombre botanicals in beautiful blues and greens and printed on a stunning linen texture. We're not sure what more you could ask for from a window dressing than this stunning meadow teal roller blind. There's wild clematis, quaking grass and wild oats from the greek countryside, in ombre botanicals in beautiful blues and greens and printed on a stunning linen texture.

products.title: Ombre Teal Roller Blind
products.description: It's like looking at a beautiful, tropical sky when you look at this ombre teal roller blind by clarissa hulse. The beautiful tones are at once vibrant and relaxing as they cascade down the fabric becoming ever more intense. This blind has designer style written all over it and w it's like looking at a beautiful, tropical sky when you look at this ombre teal roller blind by clarissa hulse.

products.title: Blowing Grasses Blue Roller Blind
products.description: These inky grasses started out life in the british and greek countrysides before making their way onto this stunning roller blind design, carefully crafted by the inimitable clarissa hulse. Here the blowing grasses roller blind is picked out in beautiful, relaxing blues on a cont these inky grasses started out life in the british and greek countrysides before making their way onto this stunning roller blind design, carefully crafted by the inimitable clarissa hulse.

products.title: Watercolour Stripe Blue Roller Blind
products.description: There's no need to feel blue, especially when it's used so wonderfully as in this watercolour stripe design from clarissa hulse. In fact, it's positively exciting and will give a real boost to a flagging decor. The stripes were originally handpainted by clarissa herself using the there's no need to feel blue, especially when it's used so wonderfully as in this watercolour stripe design from clarissa hulse.

products.title: Bali Azure Roller Blind
products.description: Bright and bountiful, this bali azure roller blind features a tropic of colour, bright blues nestled against fiery orange and even a touch of sand. This design forms part of their harlequin additions collection, dedicated to delivering style and flare for your home, and we certai bright and bountiful, this bali azure roller blind features a tropic of colour, bright blues nestled against fiery orange and even a touch of sand.

products.title: Woodland, Saxon Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: You'll love the gorgeously abstract blue tones of the misty woodland in saxon blue. The occasional sage green and pale dove grey is there to accent, and the imagery sits on a clean white background for contrast. Add the saxon blue to a downstairs cloakroom or utility to give the room a cool hue by painting the room a soft white and accessorising with blues and greens. To go along with the woodland theme, add some foliage or wildflower wall art to boot.

products.title: William Morris Compton Velvet Dusky Teal Roman Blind
products.description: Were still very much a fan of teal, and this contemporary colour trend continues to pop up in lots of their favourite designs. Featured here in the compton velvet dusky teal roman blind, from their william morris range in collaboration with the v&a, teal has been combined with were still very much a fan of teal, and this contemporary colour trend continues to pop up in lots of their favourite designs.

products.title: William Morris Acorn Soft Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Part of their collaboration with the v&a, this william morris designed acorn soft blue roman blind truly transcends the times. The beautifully classic soft blue tone is a great choice if youre looking to create a fresh and contemporary scheme with a touch of historic appeal.
